exercises.name: Bodyweight Squat Jumps
exercises.cue: Land soft like a ninja. Explode up, absorb the landing.

exercises.name: Reverse Lunges
exercises.cue: Keep chest tall. Don't let the front knee cave in.

exercises.name: Single-Leg Glute Bridges
exercises.cue: Drive through the heel. Feel it in the hamstring/glute.

exercises.name: Lateral High Knees Shuffle
exercises.cue: Violent arm action. Drive elbows back.

exercises.name: Plank Shoulder Taps
exercises.cue: Hips stay still! Imagine a glass of water on your back.

exercises.name: Alternating Jump Lunges (Burnout)
exercises.cue: Be explosive but safe. If form breaks, stop.

exercises.name: Push-Up with T-Rotation
exercises.cue: Push up, then reach for the sky. Follow hand with eyes.

exercises.name: Russian Twists
exercises.cue: Squeeze shoulder blades together. Thumbs up.

exercises.name: Spiderman Push-ups
exercises.cue: Knees hover 1 inch off ground. Alternating leg.

exercises.name: Knee to Elbows
exercises.cue: Rotate shoulders, not just hands.

exercises.name: Side Plank Dips
exercises.cue: Drop hip to floor, drive it up high.

exercises.name: Seated V-Ups (Burnout)
exercises.cue: Hands stabilize body. Lift legs over object.

exercises.name: Skater Jumps
exercises.cue: Push off outside edge of foot. Stick the landing.

exercises.name: Lateral Line Hops
exercises.cue: Hop over/back as fast as possible.

exercises.name: Lateral High-knee Shuffle
exercises.cue: Pump arms vigorously. Knees lift high.

exercises.name: Dead Bugs
exercises.cue: Lower back GLUED to the floor. Move slow.

exercises.name: Frog Broad Jumps
exercises.cue: Land soft in frog-like stance (squat).

exercises.name: Mountain Climbers (Burnout)
exercises.cue: Drive knees to chest. Keep hips low.

exercises.name: Wrist/Forearm Flexor Stretch
exercises.cue: Arm straight, palm facing out. Pull fingers back gently.

exercises.name: Cross-Body Shoulder Stretch
exercises.cue: Pull arm across chest lightly. Keep shoulder relaxed.

exercises.name: Tricep Overhead Stretch
exercises.cue: Reach down center of back. Gentle pull on the elbow.

exercises.name: Kneeling Hip Flexor Stretch
exercises.cue: Squeeze glute of the kneeling leg. Push hips forward gently.

exercises.name: Figure Four Stretch
exercises.cue: Cross ankle over opposite knee. Pull thigh towards chest.

exercises.name: Single Leg Stretch
exercises.cue: One leg out, one leg in. Reach for toes with a flat back.

exercises.name: Childâ€™s Pose
exercises.cue: Sit back on heels, reach arms forward. Breathe deep into ribs.
